refnamediv.refpurpose: revokes user granted rights on given nodes and partitions (root command)

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: kadeluser revokes deployment rights to the specified user on the given partition

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: -l, --login login the login of the user. This option can be used more than once to specify several users.
-m, --machine hostname specifies a host. This option can be used more than once to specify several hosts. By default, the deployment rights are revoked for all the nodes.
-p, --partition partition the target partition. This option can be used more than once to specify several partitions. By default, the deployment rights are revoked for all the partitions.

refsect1.title: RETURN VALUE
refsect1.para: kadeluser returns 0 if it fails. Otherwise, it returns 1.

refentry.refsect1:
EXAMPLE
kadeluser -l titi -p hda3 # revokes rights to user titi on all nodes on partition hda3
kadeluser -m node1 -p hdb6 # revokes rights to all the users on node1 partition hdb6
kadeluser -l toto -m node1 -m node2 -p hda1 # revokes rights to user toto on node1 and node2 partition hda1
etc.
